document.full_text: american superconductor's  shares plunged 44 percent on wednesday, a day after the maker of electrical systems for wind farms said its largest customer refused to accept shipments, a move that could trigger a series of problems for the u.s. company.
document.title: amsc shares tumble as top customer rejects shipments
